item.title: By: Fitness programs
item.dc:creator: Fitness programs
item.description: I have a problem with the overall premise of your article but I still think its really informative. I really like your other posts. Keep up the great work. If you can add more video and pictures can be much better. Because they help much clear understanding. :) thanks
